website_summaries.verdict: If you need an all-natural set of taper candles and enjoy the light fragrance of organic beeswax, these honey-hued candles are for you.
pros: Available in sets of 2, 3, 4, 6, 12, and 16 taper candles
8 hours of burn time per candle

customer_reviews.title: Bad Value For The Money
customer_reviews.text: These candles are pretty, however I was definitely disappointed for the burn time. The burn time in the description says they burn for approximately 8 hours...ummm, these burn for barely 3 hours, and in my opinion is not APPROXIMATELY 8 hours. Also, if you are looking for a dripless candle this is absolutely not a good choice either. I buy quality candles all the time and wanted to give these a try since they are supposed to burn cleaner. $24 is way too much money considering the short burn time.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Macke

customer_reviews.title: These candles are very nice. One reviewer commented that they barely smell
customer_reviews.text: These candles are very nice. One reviewer commented that they barely smell. One does not burn beeswax candles to get a scent, they are supposed to be virtually orderless. Sometimes you can detect a vague, very light beeswax scent if you sniff a new candle itself. I am happy with the candles; however, the unusual instructions on the bookmark contain information of a spiritual nature that is not biblical. It is not necessary to include such instructions on how to light and extinguish candles. Otherwise, I would have given 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: G. C. Christensen III

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful candles!
customer_reviews.text: These candles are beautiful! They burn very well and look great.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Fits the Ann Voskamp wooden advent wreath
customer_reviews.text: I was given a wooden advent wreath made by Ann Voskamp's son but it didn't come with candles. I'm happy to report that these are lovely, smell great AND fit the holes in the wreath. I had a hard time finding any that would.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

customer_reviews.title: Great candles
customer_reviews.text: Really nice, well-made candles that are period appropriate and thus exactly what I wanted for an early 1900s antique candle holder. It is not always easy to find 100% beeswax candles that aren't in a honeycomb style/finish, even harder to find them still made in the US, and I also didn't want to have to buy candles by the dozen, so these were the ticket! Add a clean burn and no drips, and that takes us to 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: C. Meagher

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetically Pleasing and Economical
customer_reviews.text: Lovely candles! We use them for a European ceramic advent stand. Very nice! The writing that comes with it is a bit idiosyncratic but the advice is correct: better to use a candle snuffer than to blow out candle to prolong life of candles.
customer_reviews.author: GWD

customer_reviews.title: big drippy mess !
customer_reviews.text: i like candle light first of all. these are substandard. i fell for low price. don't be me. i had to clean more wax off my desk than was on candle if that is possible. like everything in life, spend more get more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than described
customer_reviews.text: Candles are described as being 3/4" diameter. In reality, they're skinnier, measuring between 1/2" and 5/8".
customer_reviews.author: SAF

customer_reviews.title: They are definitely not dripless candles
customer_reviews.text: They drip like the dickens. What a mess they make on the wooden candle holders shown in the picture. I gave this product the rating I did for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: elaine

customer_reviews.title: These candles are so nice. They clean the air without any artificial fragrances
customer_reviews.text: These candles are so nice. They clean the air without any artificial fragrances. They have a warm glow to them and burn for a while. The packaging is even nice! I loved everything about them.
customer_reviews.author: Genesis

customer_reviews.title: 6 hour burn time not 8 hours as stated in description
customer_reviews.text: These are a type of beeswax candle, but I did a test with two other brands and this candle burned quicker than advertised. I believe they say it’s an 8 hour candle. It burned exactly 6 hours. They are more slender than other candles, which may be useful for certain candle holders. However my candle holders are standard so a thicker (standard) taper candle diameter is more useful to me. And actually they were more expensive than the brand I tested them against- both initially and for burn time.
customer_reviews.author: Candle lover

customer_reviews.title: Almost too small
customer_reviews.text: The candles appear to be well-made and I like the natural looking color. They look nice in the pewter candelabra. Almost too slender though - ideally they would be slightly bigger in diameter for my purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bluecorn is exceptional quality and burn clean! Just makes life better with them in my home!
customer_reviews.author: Nettie A.

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Packaged well and smells SO GOOD!! Beeswax is the best for candles because it emits negative ions that can actually clear the air. These came with a little card that talks about the energy of natural beeswax in meditation. It was a nice addition.
customer_reviews.author: PaelyJade

customer_reviews.title: wax quality
customer_reviews.text: I am in shock ... many times before today have ordered wax candles from this company. I was always satisfied with the quality - the color and aroma of the candles. But today I am completely upset and outraged by the quality. Where is the floral and aromatic scent of wax? Where does the candle stick to the touch? Where a pleasant natural aroma from burning? The candles look like they've been mixed with paraffin !!! This awful pale color (look at the photo - the difference with the candle stub from the old batch) and awful paraffin smell ... I can't calm down. I ordered WAX candles!
customer_reviews.author: VLADIMIR

customer_reviews.title: Burn a little fast, thinner than expected, would make a nice gift though!
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent and am always looking for quality beeswax candles, these are nice, I don't mean to put them down at all... however, they burn quickly and are a bit thin. I like the candles I get from the church supply but I wanted to check out a new source. They'd make a nice gift for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Fuentes

customer_reviews.title: Great candles.
customer_reviews.text: I love these candles. I love burning candles in the winter and these are great tapers. I prefer beeswax candles, which tend to be more expensive than other types of candles, and I buy these whenever I can afford to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Kara mia

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Candles For Shabbat
customer_reviews.text: I bought these candles to light for Shabbat and I love them. They have the most lovely light scent and burn beautifully! I even save the wax drippings to use in my wax burner with a few drops of essential oil. Excellent quality candles and worth the cost. Will definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Hunnicutt

customer_reviews.title: Very clean burning and carefully packaged
customer_reviews.text: The candles burn cleanly and smell nice. My only reason for not giving 5 stars is there was no pretty purple color otherwise I really like the candles and the care in packaging them for sending them.
customer_reviews.author: S J Seymour

customer_reviews.title: The best beeswax candles I have found in Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I have made three purchases of these beeswax candles and they have by far been the best, cleanest and even burn candles I have found for beeswax! I have sadly struggled trying to find some good quality beeswax candles that don't waste the wax by burning a hole deep into the candle without evenly melting the surface of the wax. These candles I have fallen in love with, the energy feels delicate and lovely and well made! I plan to order some more again soon!
customer_reviews.author: SS🌻

customer_reviews.title: The Best Candles
customer_reviews.text: Oh my, do these smell good when one lights them. Handsome, well made and elegant, these are great candles.
customer_reviews.author: DUSA

customer_reviews.title: They look good- BUT
customer_reviews.text: These are nice looking and they burn clean but they are not dripless, at all. I wish I could figure out how to attach my picture with wax everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Top quality
customer_reviews.text: The candles ars excellent, well made and burn well. The information that came with the candles was great. I will buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: R.

customer_reviews.title: simply amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using bees wax candles for a long time now and these are simply the best combination of quality and price that I've found. They are really easy to set in place and hold steady. They burn great - not too fast but you do have to use them sparingly cuz well... bees's wax! They smell amazing too!
customer_reviews.author: Nikita Pushkareva

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Unlike many so-described "drip less" beeswax candles that were horrible - these really were drip less. Couldn't be happier to have finally found a beeswax candle brand that meets expectations. Will be ordering more of these in various shapes and sizes. ,
customer_reviews.author: FLebel

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I love BCandle and their products and keep ordering from them. Absolutely the best beeswax candles you can buy.
customer_reviews.author: jvmeadows

customer_reviews.title: These are real beeswax.
customer_reviews.text: I raise bees, and just didn't have enough wax for my own candles this year. However, this is the next best thing. As soon as I opened the package, I was greeted with that unmistakable (and synthetically unreproducible) smell of real beeswax. My Holiday candelabra is going to be awesome this year!!
customer_reviews.author: Truth Shall Set You Free

customer_reviews.title: bad smell...not like any bees wax candles I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy to find these on Amazon... upon getting them... they smell very strange not like any beeswax candle I have ever gotten before. They smell even worse when burned.I have used beeswax candles for a long time and really enjoy the fragrance that comes from them... these smell worse than cheap paraffin candles. I take at face valve that these are as the people selling them say are actual bees wax... but something is definitely wrong with this product. I am sending them back... very disappointing.I will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: areviewer

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Came wrapped nicely with a message of burning Beeswax candles which I never knew! Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Nuccio

customer_reviews.title: Will gladly do business with again!
customer_reviews.text: It worked well, for what intended for, very fast delivery
customer_reviews.author: Alcan

customer_reviews.title: attractive  and honey smell
customer_reviews.text: attractive and a honey smell that is safe, non chemical
customer_reviews.author: canary

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tapers for dinner.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful candles. No dripping and a very pleasant soft scent.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Beeswax Candles Burn Well Without Dripping
customer_reviews.text: Candles are shaped well and burns without smoking or dripping. I will buy these again and recommend them. They are a golden color.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Harden

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, yet bleeding candles
customer_reviews.text: I love that these candles are beeswax. Also love their look. Reason for 4 stars instead of 5 is because every time I’ve burned (ordered this product twice) halfway through at least one of the candles - they bleed, making a real mess on the floor & the candle sticks.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: A Go-To holiday party gift, and easier than finding time to
customer_reviews.text: arrange a world class tray of appetizers and hope they don't turn over in the car on the way to all those holiday parties where you're told "Just bring yourself!"? This makes it better. Wish they were a little thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent No Odors which I love you will pay more ...
customer_reviews.text: excellent No Odors which I love you will pay more but you will get more too. nicely wrapped and ready for gift giving
customer_reviews.author: pattycake

customer_reviews.title: Dripping
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these before and were pleased. The last few orders I’ve gotten have not gone well. The candles drip too much.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Loved these candles. They are beautiful and smell wonderful. I used candle sticky stuff to adhere them in my candle stick. Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: L. Miller

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: these are So nice!! great gift and beautiful!! great packaging and caring company!! really glad to get these!!
customer_reviews.author: pa

customer_reviews.title: Quick service, thoughtfully packaged in recyclable paper,
customer_reviews.text: loved the tips for meditation included in the order as well as the thank you card. I have ordered before and these candles do last the advertised eight hours if not in a breeze. An excellent value When these are done, I will be purchasing more
customer_reviews.author: charlie anderson

customer_reviews.title: Nice candles-as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I use candles often for dinner or just ambience. I like that they are non-toxic and not heavily scented.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with a quality item
customer_reviews.text: Well made candle with the lovely beeswax smell!! Very pleased with a quality item!
customer_reviews.author: cindy lecroy

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality candles
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality candles. Protected well in shipping. Nice and straight, beautiful color, right size, no flaws. Burns slow with no dripping. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Viciousterra

customer_reviews.title: Super happy
customer_reviews.text: Great product, nice sent and perfect size for vintage candle holder. Double up on your order as they do burn quickly. I'm also a fan of dripping candle wax .. you'll get that effect with these candles.
customer_reviews.author: Murphthesurf

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very cute and safe for my baby and animals. fit perfectly and snug in my candle stick holder.
customer_reviews.author: Marvi Darling

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Candle!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price and best of all you don't have to buy a box full! They color and description online is very accurate. I'm not burning them so I can not speak to the smell or melting.
customer_reviews.author: Moonfig

customer_reviews.title: Naturally
customer_reviews.text: Natural beeswax over iffy parafin. Our canine companion has had seizures, so cleaning up the toxins in our home.
customer_reviews.author: Aunt Tee

customer_reviews.title: Threw them away.
customer_reviews.text: Did not appreciate the new age nonsense that was enclosed in the package. Don't want that in my home. Threw them away.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Rankin

customer_reviews.title: Exquisite candles
customer_reviews.text: These candles are exquisite. They hold a beautiful energy and create a lovely atmosphere when they burn. Their soft warm glow melts my heart.
customer_reviews.author: april gladden

customer_reviews.title: they are wonderful candles. They burn nicely and evenly for a ...
customer_reviews.text: they are wonderful candles. They burn nicely and evenly for a long time...nothing is wasted and they leave a lovely nice scent.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: They're pretty and smell like fresh beeswax
customer_reviews.text: Decorative but not functional. These candles have a lot of water in them and the wax explodes everywhere when they burn. They're pretty and smell like fresh beeswax, but can't be lit..
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful candles
customer_reviews.text: These candles are very beautiful with a vintage or antique feel. I am very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Dripless
customer_reviews.text: Expensive, but dripless. Doesn't burn too fast, doesn't drip and waste wax.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Clean and even burn
customer_reviews.text: It has beautiful flame and clean and even burn. Peaceful to look at. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: CANDLES DRIPPED
customer_reviews.text: Have burned 2 candles and experienced dripping. Have been in contact with BCandle and they are very responsive but after following all their directions I still have the dripping so will be trying another brand. If a candle is advertised not to drip, then it should not drip. I'll see how other Beeswax candles will work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Shipped QUICK
customer_reviews.text: Thank you so much! Just what I needed and it shipped fast!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great choice in taper candles
customer_reviews.text: Long burning, great alternative to all the scented candles that make air quality unbearable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful candles. They arrived within a few days and I like the informational pamphlet that came with them.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like that the candles are shaped to stick in the holder
customer_reviews.author: julie bourgoin

customer_reviews.title: Not good.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these. One burned ok but had some drips which was not good. The other one sitting right beside it, turned into a glob of melted was in less that a half hour. I would not buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Not a bit of drip.
customer_reviews.text: I love these and was glad to only buy two and not a 40 pack! There is a lovely very light honey scent and not one bit of drip. Perfect. These were hard to find in local stores. Glad to find here.
customer_reviews.author: CTS

customer_reviews.title: Not..Worth the price!!
customer_reviews.text: Poor!! product!! they all burn very quickly! Not Worth the price!! they should last 8 hours for the price you pay!!
customer_reviews.author: Laughoutloud!!!!😂

customer_reviews.title: Includes Christian propaganda
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was buying candles. Just candles. Package included Christian propaganda: a pen and promotion with the words "God has no days off." Also included is a miniature American flag. Taken together the statement is both political and religious. Unacceptable. Returned. Dear seller: please separate your business from your personal beliefs.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Great packaging, but they barely smell
customer_reviews.text: Great packaging, but they barely smell, they are really drippy, and didn't last long... Maybe an hour per candle. Disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Hurst

customer_reviews.title: expensive and full of religious and sales material
customer_reviews.text: came full of religious "god never sleeps" packaging and very non-amazonish...
customer_reviews.author: GPN

customer_reviews.title: Truly Lovely Candles!
customer_reviews.text: These are truly lovely candles. They are packaged beautifully and are made in the USA! Perfect for gifting. They have a beautiful light honey fragrance...and the color is neutral and all the candle colors match. Will buy these again for sure!
customer_reviews.author: S. Morse

customer_reviews.title: great candles
customer_reviews.text: Burn clean, smell nice. As long as no drafts hit the flame and the wick is kept trimmed, they burn evenly as well. I use them for reading and while in the bath, but when the HVAC turns on and the breeze hits it, it will immediately burn uneven and half the candle will be lost in a matter of minutes. Same with an open window or any drafty spot. Likely the case with any candle.
customer_reviews.author: heather raven

customer_reviews.title: Frankly, I am very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I love how these candles burn. They have a smooth quality to them and it is quite obvious the wick is straight in every candle. It is quite obvious the candle maker takes pride in her work and the candle themselves give off a very fresh, gentle odor that shows the surrounding air is being cleaned, not weighed down with a fake scent. I will gladly purchase from this seller again and again. Very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: momomany7

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and safe for our allergies.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful candles. What's more important, their formula is safe for our household's specific allergies! It's a rare find, hopefully they will continue making these using the same healthy ingredients. Thank you for a good product!
customer_reviews.author: Boysemorsh

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful candles, but too thin for regular candleholders
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful candles with a gorgeous beeswax smell and color. Lovely packaging, too. Unfortunately they will be very difficult for me to use because they are too thin to fit any of my regular candlesticks/candleholders.
customer_reviews.author: British TV fan

customer_reviews.title: These are quite thin
customer_reviews.text: They are a bit shy of 3/4 inch in diameter..but the overall affect is of a thin candle. They do fit in the candle holder because of the wider base. This is not a substantial-looking candle ( unlike a Williamsburg candle of the same shape for example).
customer_reviews.author: Emily Scout

customer_reviews.title: They Are Truly Drip-less
customer_reviews.text: Love these!!! They are being used in a hanging chandelier in our cabin as a light source. The candles aren't messy and there is not the issue of messy wax dripping on the floor or people. Very happy with the products appearance, the longevity of the candles, and will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JLC

customer_reviews.title: Candles For Living!
customer_reviews.text: Love these all-natural beeswax candles. The scent is there, wonderful and not strong and over-powering like the scented ones. One candlestick will last for hours, keeping the wick trimmed is a must. I have wooden matches to light and extinguish with wet thumb and forefinger. I'll have one candle lit when we are at home especially when we're cooking. There's nothing like the scent of real beeswax candles. Just ordered some more. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: HeloMekinVegas

customer_reviews.title: The worst, don't buy
customer_reviews.text: These candles were the worst for the money I paid!! They literally burnt down in a matter of 5 minutes and they melted everywhere and so hard to get off my crystal candle holders. SAVE YOUR MONEY!!!
customer_reviews.author: miss dzney

customer_reviews.title: The best beeswax candles for the money
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying BCandle beeswax candles for some time now, and have come to rely on the excellent quality of these candles. They burn cleanly, last long, and satisfy all my needs. They come boxed and have never arrived damaged. And they arrive with a little extra - a complimentary pen and bookmarker in the box. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Balstrode

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and reliable sellers!
customer_reviews.text: best quality beeswax candles! reliable sellers! mmmmm will never burn petroleum candles again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for a gift. The came well packaged and in great shape. My sister loved them and was happy they only had a tidge of smell, the smell of the honey they once held.
customer_reviews.author: Buckhunter88

customer_reviews.title: The aroma of these candles is so sweet it reminds me of why I love beeswax candles
customer_reviews.text: The aroma of these candles is so sweet it reminds me of why I love beeswax candles. The fact that they are non-toxic is very important to me. These are high quality and shaped well I am looking forward to seeing how they burn.
customer_reviews.author: S.S.

customer_reviews.title: Try a follower.
customer_reviews.text: I want to try burning these with a follower because they seem to want to explode into a drippy mess when you use them without one.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: These candles are beautiful and smell very pure
customer_reviews.text: These candles are beautiful and smell very pure. I love knowing that I'm burning a natural substance, instead of chemicals. I also found the product insert on how to maximize the energy of the candles to be interesting. Thanks for making a high quality product!
customer_reviews.author: HealthyGuy99

customer_reviews.title: Really nice candles. A friend gave me a little candle ...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice candles. A friend gave me a little candle holder. It's a custom made item by a blacksmith. These were perfect in the holder on the mantel over the wood stove. They burn nice, slow and clean. Good price, fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Thuban Dra.

customer_reviews.title: Love these. Great candle. Love the feel and smell.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. All natural bees wax. Smells great for non scent. Last forever. Nice and solid.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Great candles. Had no idea beeswax candles were so special

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great candles and nice quality. They arrived quickly and nicely packaged. Will buy more from this seller. Excellent

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Candles
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered from this seller several times. These candles are great to make my 1.5 year old son fall asleep. They smell great and burn in a very soothing way. Highly recommend this product!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect look for our colonial style rod iron chandelier
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, good burning, no black soot. Fit nice at bottom with substantial base to fit in candle holders or our rod iron chadelier.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend. Lovely candle .
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful scent! Arrived promptly and well wrapped and protected for shipping. Thank you. Highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Great Candles and 3/4-inch base
customer_reviews.text: These are great candles, don't drip and 3/4 size at base that I needed.

customer_reviews.title: No perfume stink.
customer_reviews.text: I hate perfumes and fragrant candles. This has almost no scent but the very faint smell of honey. Gorgeous candles.

customer_reviews.text: Great product. they are SOLID, not that thin hex-skin wrap like some candles.

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Well made and well packaged. Looks great in my sconces.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality candles
customer_reviews.text: These are really good candles, burn well and reliably without smoke or anything unpleasant. I'll buy them again.

customer_reviews.title: Other than that - they are nice and do smell nice
customer_reviews.text: I thought that beeswax candles were supposed to burn a bit more slowly... especially for the price. They have dripped a bit too, which I also thought was not supposed to happen with beeswax candles. Other than that - they are nice and do smell nice.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The candles do not fit in our standard-sized candle holders.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent burn, no scent, handsome earthy look.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my ecclectic decor, no smoke, long burn and no drips.

customer_reviews.title: A unique find
customer_reviews.text: There is something about having a candle on the dinner table that makes the food taste better. These candles really do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Charles P. Arnold Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great candles - good solid beeswax with a great smell ...
customer_reviews.text: Great candles - good solid beeswax with a great smell to them. Nicely formed at the bottom for easy use in a candle holder. Good price for the quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ciara

product_meta.title: BCandle 100% Pure Beeswax Candles (Set of 6) 8-Hour Organic Hand Made - 8 Inches Tall, 3/4 Inch Diameter; Tapers
product_meta.description:
Item Package Quantity:6- These organic beeswax candles have been produced Handmade. They are charged with positive mental images.
- Simple burning of these candles cleanses the space from negativity and protects from psychic attacks. Also ideal for fire meditation and clearing the mind.
- It is important to remember that according to the Institute of Social Ecology studies (St. Petersburg, Russia), natural beeswax, while burning, vibrates at the frequency of the spinal cord. Also great for: - meditation and prayer - energy cleansing and healing - romantic dinner - after work chill-out A burning organic beeswax candle creates a remarkable atmosphere of peace and joy.
- The bright flame of a beeswax candle produces the same beautiful light spectrum as the sun. For each pound of beeswax provided by a honey bee, the bee visits several million flowers and consumes 10 pounds of honey.
- Each candle will vary in shades of gold depending upon the flowers foraged and where the wax was used in the hive.
- Over time beeswax develops "bloom", a white powdery fog on the surface of the wax. It is not a flaw but a natural occurrence of the wax.
feature_bullets: 100% beeswax candle made with a cotton wick and contain no lead or metal.
Beeswax candles provide a pure and clean-burning flame that produces very little smoke, clean the air by releasing eco-frendly ions.

Beeswax candles burn cleaner and longer than regular paraffin candles. Beeswax taper candles measures 8 inches tall, 3/4 inch thick (21 cm tall, 18 mm thick) and has a bell shaped top and self-fitting base.
Approximately candle burn 8 hours. Like most organic stuff, each of these beeswax candles is a tiny bit different from others, which makes them all pretty unique.
